price: 16. Dheh: Cararku wax idiin ma tarayo, haddaad ka carartaan geeri ama dil,  markaas laydiin ku raaxeyn maayo (adduunka) in yar mooyaane.
arabic: قُل لَّن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡفِرَارُ إِن فَرَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ أَوِ ٱلۡقَتۡلِ وَإِذٗا لَّا تُمَتَّعُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul lan yanfaʿakumu al-firāru in farartum mina al-mawti awi al-qatli wa-idhan lā tumattaʿūna illā qalīlan
translations: you will be allowed to enjoy
